phrases: What the hell is that sound?!
While stopped at the ruins of Utgard Castle to take a brief break,
the Scouts were overwhelmed by a Titan assault, vanquishing their hope of survival.
This is nothing more than a hope of mine...
I want you... to live a life you are proud of.
I still have not told you my real name!
And then the main force of the Scouts rushed in to engage the enemy.
They successfully dismantled the Titan attack.
Eren and the others learn a surprising truth.
What sort of shape is she in?
Her right arm and leg were bitten off,
and her insides are beaten like scrambled eggs.
If she was normal, she would be dead for sure.
Ymir transformed into a Titan to fight off the other Titans and save us!
She did so with no regard for her own life,
which proves her loyalty to us, her comrades!
It is true that her judgement until now is unforgivable.
After all, she may know things useful to humanity and yet she kept quiet about it!
I imagine she did not say anything in order to protect herself.
But... now she is a changed person!
Ymir is an ally of humanity!
I know Ymir better than anybody.
She is a much simpler person than she looks!
Obviously, I hope we can build a trusting relationship with her.
Her judgement aside, the information she holds is a treasure for humanity.
this world becomes more of a confusing mess with every passing day.
You said... your real name was Historia Reiss?
Reiss, as in that noble family?
She is still in a coma.
Her bleeding has stopped, and we think steam is coming out of her wounds.
For now, take her back to Trost so she can get some proper medical care.
Our original mission... was to seal this wall.
A Titan nearly gnawed off my arm.
I thought I was done for.
Even someone as strong as you gets this way sometimes.
This is the second time for me!
Remember the time I almost got crushed in that Titan's hand?
That makes twice I have nearly died.
At this rate, I will be dead before I know it.
I picked this path on my own, but being a soldier is rough.
It is like a soldier's spirit breaks down before their body.
Though, until we plug up this wall,
there is no time to waste whining about it.
You two have been driven far enough away from your hometown.
I am thinking... this is where we got to draw the line.
Is not it about time to go back?
Compared to all the trouble we have been through, what is left to do is nothing!
We are so close, it is just another few steps till the end.
What are you guys talking about?
Reiner got his arm bit and Ymir is as you can see.
Who would have thought Ymir was a Titan, too?
We will deal with Ymir later.
I will arrange for a Scout squad to investigate your village later.
For the time being, I want you to focus on the mission to fix the wall.
I expected this place to be swarming with Titans.
It is the Garrison's advance squad.
They came to tell us where the hole is.
We spent all night looking for it...
We bumped into soldiers from Krolva and retraced our steps.
We have not seen any Titans the whole way here.
But... we know for sure there is Titans on this side of the wall.
Are you sure you are not drunk?
Wait, why are all of you here anyways?
If there is no hole in the wall, so be it.
For now, we are falling back to Trost District!
Whatever you do, do not let your guard down.
We are going back ahead of you.
There is nothing wrong with the wall?
There is been nothing like this in five years.
Why is it all happening now?
This world is getting more and more out of hand.
Five years ago, we demolished the wall and began our attack on humanity.
What if there is a Titan that dug a hole underneath the wall?
The hole will be hard to find in that case.
I am the Armored Titan and he is the Colossal Titan.
Right now, we need to focus on getting Ymir back safely.
Even with our horses, we still have to worry about Titans.
Why are you telling him, Reiner?
Our primary goal was to ensure all of humanity was wiped out,
but now there is no need for that.
If you agree to come with us, we will not have to destroy any more of the walls.
I do not understand at all!
Why do not you just come with us?
Information Available for Public Disclosure Lifts
Lifts are used to carry objects and materials over the walls.
They are easily transported and assembled and are built in such a way to facilitate emergency and tactical deployment.
Their weight is minimized for this purpose.
I know this is sudden, but we need to go now.
Well, it is something like our hometown.
It is not a bad deal, right?
You can easily avert this crisis.
And here I thought I had enough to think about yesterday...
I was finally able to get my hands on the background report for Annie Leonhart.
It is taken so long to get it because managing these reports is such a mess right now.
there were two others belonging to the
104th Cadet Corps who came from the same area as her.
Thanks to the chaos five years ago,
pretty much all of their family records are spotty or missing.
During the long-range scouting formation, their unit was given false information.
They were among those purposely told that Eren was in the right wing.
The Female Titan attacked from the right wing!
That it is possible they passed on that information to Annie...
Hey, hold on a minute, Armin.
By itself, that is not enough to prove anything.
So just in case, I would like to hear from you how these three interacted during training.
I knew Reiner and Bertholdt were from the same place, but...
I do not recall ever seeing the pair talking to Annie that much.
Well, Annie did not talk much in the first place.
When we ate, Annie would always sit alone and munch on food by herself.
I heard a rumor she liked sweets, even though she looks so grouchy!
As their comrade, I would find it hard to believe.
Set aside Bertholdt, who does not say much.
Reiner is like everyone is big brother, and he is not devious enough to deceive all of us.
Reiner gave everything he had fighting the Female Titan with me.
He would have gotten crushed in her hand if he had not-
I did mention that Eren might be at the rear of the center rank.
But Annie was too far away to hear...
Did Reiner seem overly interested in Eren's location?
I only started talking about Eren's position...
He might have written a message with his blades in her hand.
Why are you saying things like this?
Supposing that we find Reiner or Bertholdt,
act in such a way as to not reveal any suspicions.
Of course, do not make any mention of Annie Leonhart either.
Regardless if they are Annie's accomplices or not,
we need to lead them deep underground and confine them.
You are just tired, are not you?
You have been through so much, it is making you crazy.
Besides, if you were really the Armored Titan that wants to destroy humanity...
What did you think would happen?
That I would nod and say Sure, let us go?
What the hell was I thinking?
I have been here too long for my own good.
It is been three long years...
If only I never knew that there were people like this...
I do not know what is right anymore.
But the only choice for me now...
We settle this... right here, right now!
I am going to return to the hometown we lost.
That is all I care about now.
If their mission is to exterminate all of humanity, there is no turning back for them now.
Reiner and the others devote their lives to the mission...
